title: Bai Ling
description: Bai Ling, featured as an obtainable SR Simulacrum within the simulacrum system, associated with the weapon Nightingale's Feather.

awaken.name: Resoluteness
awaken.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Wayboard away, increase speed by 15% for 12 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

trait_description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will inflict damage equal to 100% of ATK, and make the target grievous for 7 seconds, taking 20% extra damage. When in team play, grievous targets receive an additional 20% physical damage.

1star.description: Restore 1 dodge attempt every fifth normal attack or after using Piercing Shot.

5star.description: Dodge skills inflict a grievous effect on targets for 7 seconds.

6star.description: Increase crit rate to grievous targets by 30% and crit damage by 50%.

set_effects.3-piece: Increase damage dealt to grievous targets by 12% / 15% / 18%.

Quickdraw.description: While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.

attacks.name: First Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 33.7% of ATK + 2.

attacks.name: Second Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 30.2% of ATK + 2.

attacks.name: Third Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 54.3% of ATK + 3.

attacks.name: Fourth Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 83.5% of ATK + 4.

attacks.name: Fifth Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 77.7% of ATK + 4 and knock the target back a short distance.

Charged Arrow.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge. Deal basic damage equal to 60.5% of ATK + 3, and 50% more for each 1 second spent charging, up to 3 seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, knocking them down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Arrow Rain.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to 198.7% of ATK + 10 area damage to targets.

Air Volley.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.

attacks.name: First Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 38.8% of ATK + 2.

attacks.name: Second Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 51% of ATK + 3.

attacks.name: Third Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 77.7% of ATK + 4.

attacks.name: Fourth Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 117% of ATK + 6.

dodge.Dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for 0.5 seconds while dodging.
dodge.Loaded Arrow: Tap attack after dodging to trigger a Loaded Arrow, which knocks the target back and deals damage equal to 85.5% of ATK + 5.

skill.Piercing Shot: Backflips and fires 1 piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to 154.8% of ATK + 8 and knocking the target back.

discharge.Explosive Barrage: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, remove all debuffs from the wielder, and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to 486.6% of ATK + 26.
